project.name: Kabootar
project.description: With Kabootar, now you can share all your files with your friends and family in a jiffy. Using Kabootar's peer-to-peer framework, we can now share files securely and privately without the need for any third-party servers. Kabootar is cross-platform and works on any device without any downloads. Kabootar uses WebRTC to transfer files. The project is open source and can be self-hosted on any servers to begin file sharing securely for your own self.
